TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AccessDataSourceDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner

summary.span: 在視覺化設計工具中，為 Web 伺服器控制項提供設計階段支援。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在視覺化設計工具中，當您從來源切換至 [設計] 檢視中，標記來源的程式碼，描述控制項的剖析和設計階段建立的版本控制，也就是只是預留位置，是在設計介面上。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the control is parsed and a design-time version of the control, which is just a placeholder, is created on the design surface. 當您切換回來源檢視，請設計階段控制項，其中包括中的屬性值**屬性**方格中保存的標記來源的程式碼，並編輯網頁的標記。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control, which includes the values of the properties in the **Properties** grid, is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. ## Examples 本節提供兩個程式碼範例。This section provides two code examples. 第一個範例示範如何擴充類別。The first demonstrates how to extend the class. 第二個示範如何以衍生一份類別，並將它與設計工具產生關聯。The second demonstrates how to derive a copy of the class and associate it with a designer. 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充類別。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the class. 程式碼會改變的預留位置，表示設計介面上的控制項，並將屬性加入至**屬性**方格。The code alters the placeholder that represents the control on the design surface and adds a property to the **Properties** grid. [!code-csharp[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/CS/exampleaccessdatasource.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/VB/ExampleAccessDataSource.vb#4)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何衍生一份類別，並將它與上述範例中所定義的設計工具產生關聯。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a copy of the class and associate it with the designer that was defined in the preceding example. [!code-csharp[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/CS/exampleaccessdatasource.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/VB/ExampleAccessDataSource.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在內部建立的新執行個體類別時，它會建立相關聯的預留位置設計介面上的控制項。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates a placeholder for the associated control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataFile : string with get, set

summary.span: 實作設計工具屬性，以遮蔽關聯控制項的 屬性。

span.span: Implements a designer property to shadow the property of the associated control.

value.span: ，包含與 產生關聯的資料檔名稱和路徑。

span.span: A that contains the name and path of the data file associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定設計工具中包含的 Microsoft Access 資料庫的.mdb 檔案的路徑與名稱將用於相關聯的屬性控制項。Set the property in the designer to the name and path of the .mdb file containing the Microsoft Access database to use for the associated control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示相關聯的存取資料檔案的路徑與名稱控制項預留位置，在設計階段中的控制項。The following code example shows how to use the property to display the name and path of the Access data file that is associated with the control in the control placeholder at design time. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/CS/exampleaccessdatasource.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/VB/ExampleAccessDataSource.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetConnectionString() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetConnectionString () As String

summary.span: 取得在設計階段有效的連接字串，以供與這個設計工具關聯的控制項使用。

span.span: Gets the connection string that is valid at design time for the control that is associated with this designer.

returns.span: ，包含關聯 的設計階段連接字串。

span.span: A that contains the design-time connection string for the associated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法對應屬性的控制項設計工具的站台，然後再使用產生連接字串的控制項屬性。The method maps the property of the control to the designer site, and then uses the property of the control to generate the connection string. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以顯示 Microsoft Access 資料庫的連接字串相關聯控制項預留位置，在設計階段中的控制項。The following code example shows how to use the method to display the connection string of the Microsoft Access database that is associated with the control in the control placeholder at design time. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/CS/exampleaccessdatasource.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/VB/ExampleAccessDataSource.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 集合，實作已加入和已遮蔽屬性的 。

span.span: A collection implementing the of the added and shadowed properties.

summary.span: 供設計工具使用，以便在 [屬性] 方格中加入或移除屬性，或是遮蔽關聯控制項的屬性。

span.span: Used by the designer to add properties to, or remove them from, the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項設計工具使用的方法，衍生自陰影對應的設計階段屬性設計工具實作，使用的各種控制項屬性，以將屬性新增至，或移除它們，方法**屬性**方格。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to, or remove them from, the **Properties** grid. 針對控制方法會建立在設計階段屬性，以遮蔽控制項的屬性。For the control, the method creates the design-time property to shadow the property of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，讓屬性為唯讀，且出現在**屬性**方格。The following code example shows how to override the method to make the property read-only and visible in the **Properties** grid. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/CS/exampleaccessdatasource.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebNet.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner/VB/ExampleAccessDataSource.vb#4)]

para.span: 覆寫方法，以將屬性加入至設計階段屬性集合，或變更其屬性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to the design-time property collection or change their attributes.

para.span: 請務必呼叫基底方法，然後再執行其他處理程序。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.
